commitResults.messageTitle: Added welcome message for Duke as per Week 2 project timeline.
Added Level 1 increment to greet, echo and exit.
Added Level 2 increment to Add, List. Program now remembers the input items and can output the items in the list using the command "list".
Added Level 3 increment, Mark as Done. Changed list check from direct string check to contains check to avoid adding as task if there are accidental spaces.
Added Level 4 increment, ToDos, Events, Deadlines. Added files Deadline, Event and Todo to subclasses to Task. Added new function getTypeIcon to Task.
Added A-TextUITesting. Auto tests 1 todo, 1 deadline and 1 event task and the list function.

Added A-CodeQuality increment, refactored code and implemented most changes as commented by fellow peers during PR. Duke main function should still be furthered streamlined for fewer lines of code. Will continue to work on that.

Added Level 5 and A-Exceptions increment. Added exception handler for incorrect number of parameters given for the different type of tasks. Added exception handler for exiting program when it is still waiting for input. Added exception for no task type specified.
Merge branch 'branch-Level-5'

**Duke.java** Imported ArrayList package. Changed array of tasks to ArrayList of tasks. Removed use of constant MAX_NUM_OF_TASKS. Renamed printTask to printAddTask for less confusion between deletion and addition. Added exception handler for main, IndexOutOfBounds exception when mark/unmark/delete are not given index numbers of elements currently in the ArrayList. Added printError for the exception handler. Removed use of int index in main code. Checks for size of ArrayList in the individual functions when needed instead. Added Level-6 increment to support deletion of tasks.
commitResults.messageBody:
**Task.java**
Removed additional square brackets in intermediary printing as it has been added to getStatusIcon function instead.

commitResults.messageTitle: Added Level 7 increment to allow saving of current list and reading of existing list in Duke.txt. Program will save list to /data/Duke.txt. Directory will be made if non-existent. Changed Array[] lists to ArrayList<Task> lists for better management.
Merge branch 'branch-Level-6'
Merge branch 'branch-Level-7'
Packaged Task and Task types into duke.task Packaged Main and Storage into duke.util Pacakged DukeException into duke.exception
commitResults.messageBody: Data file now gets saved in src/main/java/data

commitResults.messageTitle: Moved a lot of code to separate files for MORE OOP. Duke rebrought out of package.
Added Level 9 increment to be able to search for items in the existing list. Amended command check for list to de-conflict with search terms including "list".
Added JavaDoc to most functions and classes. Moved getInput from ui package to parser package. Removed exception handler when registering to-do task.
Merge pull request #1 from clement559/branch-Level-9
Merge branch 'master' into A-JavaDoc
Merge pull request #2 from clement559/branch-A-JavaDoc
Update README.md
Adding more documentation for new functions for search.
Creation of new Command package for stretch goal. Created separate extensions of main Command file for respective commands. Amended print output for deletion of tasks.
Update README.md
commitResults.messageBody: Reverting changes to main README file

commitResults.messageTitle: Update README.md
Updated printing format to standardise across all commands.
Merge branch 'master' of https://github.com/clement559/ip
Removed UI object from MarkTaskCommand. Created new function MarkAsDoneSilent in Task so that when doing initial reading of tasks from Dukefile, no printing occurs when marking completed tasks.
Added Level-8 increment. Edited error messages produced by Deadline, Event and Todo. Added invalid checker to ensure null tasks do not get created.
Merge pull request #3 from clement559/branch-Level-8
Merge branch 'master' of https://github.com/clement559/ip
Updated README.md to reflect Level 8 increment changes.
Removed redundant toExit function and isExit variable since deprecated. Checks are now done in command class.
